participant_1.background:
I spent my summer nights at the coffee shop, watching the stars.
Rita Hayworth is my idol and I like to work out to stay in shape.
i would rather read a book than watch a movie.
I love spending time with my grandpa on the weekend.
I am worried about my child's future.

participant_2.background:
I have a big personality to match my beer gut.
i almost always wear a t shirt and jeans.
I like to spend time alone, pursuing my own interests.
my weakness are sweets.
I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year.

content.text: What is your favorite way to spend a summer night?
I like to watch the stars with friends and family.
Where do you live that you can see the stars?
I live in a small town on the coast.
Oh, that sounds amazing! I would love to live somewhere with a beautiful night sky.
It is! I love spending time outside.
Me too! I love to go for walks in the woods and just enjoy nature.
That sounds like fun. I like to go hiking and camping too.
I've never been camping, but I've always wanted to try it.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I will! It sounds like it would be a great way to get away from the hustle and bustle of city life.
It is! It's a great way to relax and reconnect with nature.
I could definitely use some relaxation.
Me too! We should go camping together sometime.
That sounds like a great idea! We could make a whole weekend out of it.
Perfect! We could go hiking, fishing, and just have a good time.
Sounds like the perfect way to spend a summer weekend.
I'm excited! Let's make it happen soon!
